price: 65. Roep deze dag niet luid aan! Zeker, jullie zullen door Ons niet geholpen worden.
arabic: لَا تَجۡـَٔرُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ إِنَّكُم مِّنَّا لَا تُنصَرُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: lā tajarū al-yawma innakum minnā lā tunṣarūna
